DOC.brief_title: Split-face Tolerability Comparison Between Adapalene-Benzoyl Peroxide Gel Versus Tretinoin Gel
DOC.detailed_description: Adult subject acne vulgaris receive tretinoin gel 0.1 % one side face adapalene 0.1 % / benzoyl peroxide 2.5 % gel side face daily period 3 week ( 22 day ) . Tolerability assessment ( erythema , dryness , scaling , stinging/burning ) side face take visit , weekday baseline day 22 . The investigator subject respond user preference question day 5 , 12 , 19 , 22 .
